title: Replace placeholder logos with actual Barebarbells logo image

requirements.text: Replace all existing placeholder or text-based logos throughout the site with the uploaded Barebarbells logo image (stylized BB symbol with barbell design and 'YOUR COMEBACK STARTS HERE' tagline)

quotes: Remove earlier logo with logo pic everywhere pic attached
Replace it with this uploaded logo image everywhere throughout the site

acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded Barebarbells logo image appears in the Navigation component header
The uploaded Barebarbells logo image appears in the Hero section
The uploaded Barebarbells logo image appears in the Footer component
All previous placeholder or text-based logo implementations are removed
The logo maintains appropriate sizing and quality across all placements

constraints: Use the exact uploaded logo image file (IMG_20260220_224309-2.jpg) as the source
Do not create or generate a new logo; use the provided image
nonGoals: Creating new logo variations or designs
Modifying the logo's appearance or styling beyond standard image rendering
Adding logos to locations not currently displaying a logo
